lines.text: As per SEBI's Circular, the Company's shares are put under compulsory trading in dematerialised form in all the Stock
Exchanges where the Equity shares of your Company are listed. The electronic connectivity with National Securities
Depositories Limited (NSDL) and Central Depository Services (India) Lid. (CDSL) has been established and Intime
Spectrum Registry Lid. have been appointed as the Registrar for Electronic Connectivity with NSDL and CDSL.
The ISIN allotted to your Company is INE973401010.
As on 31$1 March, 2004, around 6564916 (41.00%) shares of your Company have been converted into the electronic
The Company has not issued any GDR's/ADR's and there are no warrants or any convertible instruments.
Share Transfer System & Registrar and Transfer Agent
The applications when received from Shareholders inter alia in cases of transfers, deletion of names, transmission and
issue of duplicate share certificates are processed by the Registrar and Transfer Agents on behalf of the Company.
Meetings of the Share Transfer cum Shareholders/Investors' Grievance Committee of the Board of the Directors of the
Company are held at frequent intervals as prescribed by law in order to give their consent to the said transfers,
In this respect M/s. Intime Spectrum Registry Lid., who were acting as Registrar for electronic connectivity, have been
appointed as the Registrar and Transfer Agent for Share Transfer work in physical as well as dematerilisation form
C-13, Pannalal Silk Mills Compound, Bhandup (West), Mumbai-400 078.
However, shareholders holding shares in the electronic mode should address all correspondence to their respective
(xii) Compliance Certificate from Auditors of the Company is annexed to this Report.
For and on behalf of the B
AS ANNEXURE TO THE REPORT OF THE DIRECTORS.
To the Members of GTC Industries Limited,
We have examined the compliance of conditions of Corporate Governance by GTC Industries Limited for the year ended on
3151 March, 2004, as stipulated in clause 49 of the Listing Agreements of the said Company with Stock Exchanges in India.
The compliance of conditions of Corporate Governance is the responsibility of the management. Our examination was limited
to procedures and implementation thereof, adopted by the Company for ensuring the compliance of conditions of Corporate
Governance. It is neither an audit nor an expression of opinion on the financial statements of the Company.
n our opinion and to the best of our information and according to the explanations given to us and the representations made by
the Directors and the management, we certify that the Company has generally complied with the conditions of Corporate
Governance as stipulated in the above mentioned Listing Agreement.
We state that no investor grievance is pending for a period exceeding one month as on 31s March, 2004 against the Company
is per the records maintained by the Company and presented to Share Transfer Cum Share Holders /Investors' Grievance
We further state that such compliance is neither an assurance as to the future viability of the Company nor the efficiency or
effectiveness with which the management has conducted the affairs of the Company.
